label_appear_delay.componentleveltooltip: Appear Delay||The delay before sticky tooltips appear. This delay should stop tooltips you don't intend to view from appearing when briefly mousing over their spawning element.

label_removal_delay.componentleveltooltip: Removal Delay||The time it takes for a stuck tooltip to disappear. This delay begins when your cursor is no longer hovering the tooltip or the element that spawned it. This will stop tooltips disappearing if you briefly mouse off them.

label_stick_delay.componentleveltooltip: Stick Delay||The delay between a tooltip appearing and it sticking. If you mouse off before this delay has finished (indicated by the fire), the tooltip will disappear. When stuck, tooltips can be inspected.

component_text.text: Hover Karl to test the delays you have set (Apply required).
